agents.context

Class Context

  • java.lang.Object
    • agents.Agent
      • agents.SystemAgent
        • agents.context.AbstractContext
          • agents.context.Context
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Context
extends AbstractContext
implements java.io.Serializable
    The core agent of AMOEBA.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Context

        public Context(World world,
               Head head)
        The main constructor, used by AMOEBA to build new context agent.
        Parameters:
        world - : the world where the agent must live.
        head - : the head agent associated with the next context agent
